roleset.name: to make obsolete or out of date

example.name: outdate-v: Both args
example.text: The release of the iPad 2 outdated the original iPad.

example.name: outdated-j
example.text: I wonder how outdated we will think Harry Potter is 50 years time

roleset.note: OUTDATE-V NOTES: Based on data in Clinical Notes corpus; adjectival 'outdated' based on BOLT-4,5. (from outdate.01-v)
OUTDATED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from outdated.01-j)
